bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, starting from the two thighs and the two flanks, and displaying a red color like a fire. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry jing tian 景天 quotes Yang shi chan ru ji yan fang 楊氏產乳集驗方 : 療烟火丹發從背起或兩脅及兩足，赤如火 , “It heals smoking fire cinnabar that starts either from the back or from the two flanks and two feet. It is red as fire”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jing tian 景天 in turn quotes this as: 療治烟火丹毒 , 從兩股兩脅起 ¸ 赤如火 , “It cures smoking fire cinnabar poison emerging from the two thighs and two flanks, with a redness like fire”.
